doc:
Joan Plowright https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joan_Plowright 0 Joan Ann Olivier, Baroness Olivier, DBE (née Plowright; born 28 October 1929), commonly known as Dame Joan Plowright, is a retired English actress whose career has spanned over six decades. She has won two Golden Globe Awards and a Tony Award and has been nominated for an Academy Award, an Emmy and two BAFTA Awards. She is also one of only four actresses to have won two Golden Globes in the same year. Joan_Ann_Olivier , Baroness_Olivier , DBE ( née_Plowright ; born_28_October_1929 ) , commonly_known as Dame_Joan_Plowright , is a_retired_English_actress whose_career has_spanned over six_decades . She has_won two_Golden_Globe_Awards and a_Tony_Award and has_been_nominated for an_Academy_Award , an_Emmy and two_BAFTA_Awards . She is also one of only_four_actresses to_have_won two_Golden_Globes in the_same_year .
